titlestmt.titleproper: Robert E. Hoagland collection of computer printouts related to the Irish in Philadelphia 1974-1986
titlestmt.sponsor: This collection-level EAD record is a product of the Philadelphia Area Consortium of Special Collections Libraries (PACSCL) Consortial Survey Initiative, which was funded by the Andrew W. Mellon Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: Machine-readable finding aid generated in EAD from data in the PACSCL Consortial Survey Database on 12/21/2012

did.unittitle: Robert E. Hoagland collection of computer printouts related to the Irish in Philadelphia
did.repository: The Historical Society of Pennsylvania 1300 Locust Street Philadelphia, PA 19107

scopecontent.p: The collection consists of five volumes of computer printouts from 1974 and 1986 that cross-reference information from the Philadelphia Business Directory for 1850 with census data. One volume is an index (ID and name), while three volumes of printouts are specific to Irish people in Philadelphia. The printouts list ward, district, dwelling, family, occupation, residence, spouse's name, and children. The last printout groups entries by profession and lists profession type, name and address. There are also a few photocopies of ward maps of Philadelphia for 1855 and 1875.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.

acqinfo.p: Provenance: Donated by Robert E. Hoaglund.
